LanguageData.HalfMagRace.label: Half-Mag
LanguageData.HalfMagRace.description: The Half-Mag is a mass produced super-soldier sold by unknown powers to conflict ridden rimworlds. Despite seeming biological, the Half-Magâ€™s bio-engineered body grants it extraordinary durability and power. Using a devastating charge attack to close the distance, it excels at breaking through enemy formations and tying up attention.
